languages.text: Все, с кем произошло это событие, еще долго пребывали в ужасе. Только псайкер Идира Тласс, мрачно усмехаясь, заметила, что "уборка" незваного гостя позволила ей выудить ценное воспоминание и найти давно утерянный левый носок из любимой пары.

Everyone affected by the incident was horrified for a long time afterward. Resident psyker Idira Tlass, however, remarked with a grin that the "tidying up" had allowed her to dredge up a vital memory and find the left sock that had long been missing from her favourite pair.
languages.original_text: Все, с кем произошло это событие, еще долго пребывали в ужасе. Только псайкер Идира Тласс, мрачно усмехаясь, заметила, что "уборка" незваного гостя позволила ей выудить ценное воспоминание и найти давно утерянный левый носок из любимой пары.

traits.locale_text: The incident was considered horrific by almost everyone involved. Resident psyker Idira Tlass, however, remarked with a grin that the "spring cleaning" had straightened out her memories and she was finally able to find a missing sock from her favorite pair.

The incident was considered horrific by almost everyone involved. Resident psyker Idira Tlass, however, remarked with a grin that the "spring cleaning" had straightened out her memories and she was finally able to find a missing sock from her favorite pair.

The incident was considered horrific by almost everyone involved. Resident psyker Idira Tlass, however, remarked with a grin that this "tidying up" had straightened out her memories and she was finally able to find a missing sock from her favourite pair.

The incident was considered horrific by almost everyone involved. Resident psyker Idira Tlass, however, remarked with a grin that this "tidying up" had straightened out her memories and she was finally able to find a missing sock from her favourite pair.

Everyone affected by the incident was horrified for a long time afterward. Resident psyker Idira Tlass, however, remarked with a grin that the "tidying up" had allowed her to dredge up a vital memory and find the left sock that had long been missing from her favourite pair.

Everyone affected by the incident was horrified for a long time afterward. Resident psyker Idira Tlass, however, remarked with a grin that the "tidying up" had allowed her to dredge up a vital memory and find the left sock that had long been missing from her favourite pair.

languages.text: 每个受到影响的人，在接下来的很长一段时间内都惊恐不已。然而，舰上的常驻灵能者伊迪拉·特拉斯却笑着说，这次“整理”让她找回了重要的记忆，还帮助她找到了她最喜欢的袜子——一只很久以前就不知去向的袜子。
languages.original_text: Everyone affected by the incident was horrified for a long time afterward. Resident psyker Idira Tlass, however, remarked with a grin that the "tidying up" had allowed her to dredge up a vital memory and find the left sock that had long been missing from her favourite pair.

traits.locale_text: 每个受到影响的人，在接下来的很长一段时间内都惊恐不已。然而，舰上的常驻灵能者伊迪拉·特拉斯却笑着说，这次“整理”让她找回了重要的记忆，还帮助她找到了她最喜欢的袜子——一只很久以前就不知去向的袜子。

languages.text: Todos los afectados por el incidente quedaron horrorizados durante un largo período. Sin embargo, la psíquica de abordo, Idira Tlass, afirmó sonriente que el proceso de «organización» le había permitido recordar algo muy importante y por fin había encontrado el calcetín izquierdo de su par favorito.
languages.original_text: Everyone affected by the incident was horrified for a long time afterward. Resident psyker Idira Tlass, however, remarked with a grin that the "tidying up" had allowed her to dredge up a vital memory and find the left sock that had long been missing from her favourite pair.

traits.locale_text: Todos los afectados por el incidente quedaron horrorizados durante un largo período. Sin embargo, la psíquica de abordo, Idira Tlass, afirmó sonriente que el proceso de «organización» le había permitido recordar algo muy importante y por fin había encontrado el calcetín izquierdo de su par favorito.

languages.text: この出来事に影響された全員が、その後長い間、恐怖に怯えた。しかし、専属異能者（サイカー）のイディラ・トラスは「整理整頓」によって重要な記憶が呼び覚まされ、なくしていたお気に入りの靴下の片方をやっと見つけられたのだとにこやかに語った。
languages.original_text: Everyone affected by the incident was horrified for a long time afterward. Resident psyker Idira Tlass, however, remarked with a grin that the "tidying up" had allowed her to dredge up a vital memory and find the left sock that had long been missing from her favourite pair.

traits.locale_text: この出来事に影響された全員が、その後長い間、恐怖に怯えた。しかし、専属異能者（サイカー）のイディラ・トラスは「整理整頓」によって重要な記憶が呼び覚まされ、なくしていたお気に入りの靴下の片方をやっと見つけられたのだとにこやかに語った。

languages.text: Jeder, der ein solches Erlebnis gehabt hatte, war danach lange Zeit äußerst verstört. Die Psionikerin Idira Tlass dagegen sagte grinsend, dass die "Aufräumerei" ihr geholfen habe, eine extrem wichtige Erinnerung wieder hochzuholen. Sie fand endlich den linken Socken ihres Lieblingspaars, der seit langem verschollen gewesen war.
languages.original_text: Everyone affected by the incident was horrified for a long time afterward. Resident psyker Idira Tlass, however, remarked with a grin that the "tidying up" had allowed her to dredge up a vital memory and find the left sock that had long been missing from her favourite pair.

traits.locale_text: Jeder, der ein solches Erlebnis gehabt hatte, war danach lange Zeit äußerst verstört. Die Psionikerin Idira Tlass dagegen sagte grinsend, dass die "Aufräumerei" ihr geholfen habe, eine extrem wichtige Erinnerung wieder hochzuholen. Sie fand endlich den linken Socken ihres Lieblingspaars, der seit langem verschollen gewesen war.

languages.text: Toutes les personnes affectées par l'incident en conservèrent un souvenir horrifié pendant un long moment. La psyker de bord, Idira Tlass, signala avec un sourire que ce « rangement » lui avait permis de récupérer un souvenir important et de retrouver la chaussette gauche qui manquait de sa paire préférée.
languages.original_text: Everyone affected by the incident was horrified for a long time afterward. Resident psyker Idira Tlass, however, remarked with a grin that the "tidying up" had allowed her to dredge up a vital memory and find the left sock that had long been missing from her favourite pair.

traits.locale_text: Toutes les personnes affectées par l'incident en conservèrent un souvenir horrifié pendant un long moment. La psyker de bord, Idira Tlass, signala avec un sourire que ce « rangement » lui avait permis de récupérer un souvenir important et de retrouver la chaussette gauche qui manquait de sa paire préférée.

languages.text: Bu olaydan etkilenen herkes, uzun bir süre boyunca dehşete kapıldı. Ancak geminin ruhsezeri İdira Tlass, yüzünde bir tebessümle bu "düzenlemenin" ona hayati bir anıyı hatırlama ve uzun süredir kayıp olan, en sevdiği çorap çiftinin sol tekini bulma fırsatı verdiğini söyledi.
languages.original_text: Everyone affected by the incident was horrified for a long time afterward. Resident psyker Idira Tlass, however, remarked with a grin that the "tidying up" had allowed her to dredge up a vital memory and find the left sock that had long been missing from her favourite pair.
